attributes.action: NHS in England to get £500. Pound bonus
attributes.additional_details: To show how much are nhs means to them and how much we are appreciated in these challenging times
attributes.background: NHS staff have been working tirelessly to fight against covid 19 every nhs staff in the uk deserves a 500 pound bonus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Government to match the £500 bonus to all care staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320495
